TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Isaias_Afwerki, title = Isaias_Afwerki, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isaias_Afwerki} }

S.FORM: ryax sa tay 2 nqu tay 2, Isaias Afwerki, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1946) mrhuw Eritrea ta' misuw hya' ga Isaias Afwerki, aring ryax tay 24 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 1993 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
